metadata.title: CVE-2015-3877 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Skia, as used in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48T, allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) viaa crafted media file, aka internal bug 20723696.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
